paragraph.heading: 1Using breakpoints
paragraph.paragraph:
To change the status of one breakpoint, it is possible to use the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/40_debugger/20_breakpoints/10_breakpoint_menu.xml breakpoints menu , which changes the state of a single breakpoint at a time.

To change the status of several breakpoints at the same time, the easiest way is to use the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/40_debugger/20_breakpoints/20_breakpoint_commands.xml breakpoints-related commands , which have actions at feature-scope, class-scope and system-scope.
